page.title: 05BIGGLESWADE.EDUCATION TO 13+
page.content: The Lawns Nursery school caters for 3-5 year olds who mostly attend part- time. Competition for places is keen, with names often entered at birth.Full time education usually begins at five, & the schools catering for this age range are Caldecote Lower school,Upper Caldecote, St.Andrews Lower school, Southlands Lower school & Lawnside Lower school, all in Biggleswade, each with its own catchment area. At 9+, children usually transfer to middle school, i.e. Edward Peake or Holmemead in Biggleswade. Both these establish- ments have several hundred pupils attending at any one time, numbers being inflated by children bussed in from surrounding villages. Broom has no village school & children go to Southill & Shefford for their education.
